Instruction:
Task Description: Create a Java class that implements a Redis Sentinel connection pool for managing connections to a Redis master server, with automatic failover handling when the master changes.

Class Description: JedisSentinelPool is a connection pool implementation that maintains connections to a Redis master server discovered through Redis Sentinel. It automatically handles master failover by monitoring Sentinel notifications and reconfiguring the connection pool when the master changes.

Attributes:
- LOG: Logger - Logger instance for logging events and errors
- factory: JedisFactory - Factory for creating Jedis instances
- sentinelClientConfig: JedisClientConfig - Configuration for connecting to Sentinels
- masterListeners: Collection<MasterListener> - Collection of threads monitoring Sentinel servers
- currentHostMaster: HostAndPort - Current master server address (volatile)
- initPoolLock: Lock - Lock for thread-safe pool initialization

Methods:
- JedisSentinelPool(String, Set<HostAndPort>, JedisFactory, JedisClientConfig) -> void - Constructor that initializes the Sentinel pool with master name, Sentinel addresses, factory, and client config
- initMaster(HostAndPort) -> void - Initializes or updates the master connection pool
- initSentinels(Set<HostAndPort>, String) -> HostAndPort - Discovers the current master from Sentinels and starts listeners
- toHostAndPort(List<String>) -> HostAndPort - Converts Sentinel response to HostAndPort object
- getResource() -> Jedis - Gets a Jedis resource from the pool (overrides parent method)
- returnResource(Jedis) -> void - Returns a Jedis resource to the pool (overrides parent method)

Nested Class MasterListener:
- masterName: String - Name of the monitored master
- host: String - Sentinel host address
- port: int - Sentinel port number
- subscribeRetryWaitTimeMillis: long - Retry wait time for subscription
- j: Jedis - Jedis instance for Sentinel connection
- running: AtomicBoolean - Flag controlling listener thread

MasterListener Methods:
- MasterListener(String, String, int) -> void - Constructor for Sentinel listener
- run() -> void - Main listener thread that monitors Sentinel for master changes
- shutdown() -> void - Gracefully shuts down the listener thread
